attributes.action: sack social services who missed the injuries on baby p and amy howson
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a lot of anger in many areas because the social service's did nothing at all to help baby p and Amy Howson,
Despite having the injuries they did.
Social service's could have done more and yet again it has happened again and something needs to be done.
Before another child has to go through the pain and agony of there parent/s.
As a parent myself i would never be able to harm my children in anyway. 

Something needs to be done right away because the system is letting our children down.
there should be longer jail terms for parents who kill there children

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
